price: hubiera permanecido en su vientre hasta el Día de la Resurrección.
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
